item.title: CVE-2023-34048|2024-08-19T07:47:56.653Z -- vmware -- vmware%20vcenter%20server
item.description: vCenter Server contains an out-of-bounds write vulnerability in the implementation of the DCERPC protocol.Â A malicious actor with network access to vCenter Server may trigger an out-of-bounds write potentially leading to remote code execution.
